TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BuildTemplateMethod extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A that represents the container used to store the child controls in the template.
Docs.summary: Supports ASP.NET during the creation of a template for a templated control from generated class code. The BuildTemplateMethod delegate handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledTemplateBuilder.InstantiateIn%2A> method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The BuildTemplateMethod delegate is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompiledTemplateBuilder> class, which creates a template for a templated control from generated class code.
